title: Transcript of Ukraine phone call shows Trump repeatedly pushed for investigation into Biden
text:
President Trump repeatedly prodded Ukraine's president to work with his lawyer Rudy Giuliani and the US attorney general to investigate his political rival Joe Biden, according to a transcript released by the White House.

The White House released the memo on Wednesday after Democrats announced they would launch an impeachment investigation into whether Mr Trump abused his power to interfere with the 2020 presidential election.

The conversation between Mr Trump and Ukraine's president is just one piece of a whistleblower's complaint made in mid-August.

The complaint is central to the impeachment inquiry announced Tuesday by Nancy Pelosi, the Democrat House Speaker.

Mr Trump told the Ukrainian president: "If you can look into it ... it sounds horrible to me." Mr Trump was talking about unsubstantiated allegations that Mr Biden sought to interfere with a Ukrainian prosecutor's investigation of his son, Hunter.

Mr Trump also confirmed that he ordered his staff to freeze nearly $400 million in aid to Ukraine a few days before the call.

The president says he did nothing wrong.

More to follow
description: President Trump repeatedly prodded Ukraine's president to work with his lawyer Rudy Giuliani and the US attorney general to investigate his political rival Joe Biden, according to a transcript released by the White House.
